SEARCH
Module edu.qut.cab302.wehab
Package edu.qut.cab302.wehab.dao

Class MedicationDAO

java.lang.Object
edu.qut.cab302.wehab.dao.MedicationDAO
public class MedicationDAO extends Object
This class provides methods for interacting with the medication-related tables in the database. It includes functionality for performing CRUD operations on the medications and medication reminder tables.

    • createMedicationRemindersTable

      public static void createMedicationRemindersTable() throws SQLException
      Creates the user-medication junction table in the database if it does not already exist. This table establishes a many-to-many relationship between users and medications, with a composite primary key consisting of the username and medicationID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.

    • createMedicationTables

      public static void createMedicationTables() throws SQLException
      Creates both the medications and user-medications junction tables in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while creating either of the tables.
